pages.title: Summon and Kill the Boss
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Summon and Kill the Boss$() Objective is the first Objective you will come across.$(br2)Your goal is to find between $(#033dfc)3 - 6$() Obelisks, which usually spawn in the center of a $(l:get_started/vault_rooms)Vault Room$().$(br)In each Vault there will be a maximum of $(#033dfc)10 Obelisks$() across all the rooms.

pages.title: Obelisk Activation
pages.text: To activate $(#033dfc)Obelisks$(), you simply need to right click one, this will add to the counter at the $(#033dfc)bottom of your screen$().$(br2)Once you activate the last $(#033dfc)Obelisk$() required, a $(#033dfc)Boss$() will spawn which you will have to defeat$(br2)Upon defeating the boss, a $(#033dfc)Boss Crate$() will spawn in it's place and you will be teleported out of $(#033dfc)the Vault$()

If you would like the $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() to guarantee the $(#033dfc)Summon and Kill the Boss$() Objective, you may apply a $(#033dfc)Seal of the Executioner$() to your Crystal if said Crystal is not exhausted.
